etymology.description: 山(山) (shān, 'mountain') + 要(要) (yào, 'want') = phonetic value and semantic indication of steepness -> final meaning 'high and steep'
etymology.interpretation: The character 崾(yǎo, 'high and steep') combines 山(山) (shān, 'mountain') to indicate the meaning related to mountainous terrain, with 要(要) (yào, 'want') serving as the phonetic component to suggest pronunciation and refine the meaning to specifically denote a steep, elevated place.
